/hpc2hdd/home/xhao390/py/urbanclip/data/: The image captures a serene street scene in Beijing, China. The perspective is from a pedestrian's viewpoint on the sidewalk, immersing the viewer in the city's daily life. The street is lined with lush green trees, their leaves rustling gently in the breeze, casting dappled shadows on the pavement. Cars are parked neatly on the side of the road, their metallic bodies gleaming under the soft sunlight. A few pedestrians can be seen strolling leisurely on the sidewalk, adding a touch of life to the scene. The sky above is a clear blue, devoid of any clouds, suggesting a bright and sunny day. The image beautifully encapsulates the harmony between urban life and nature in Beijing.
